0.title: Battle Pass vehicles: Centurion Mk 2
0.description: The main tank prize of the new season is the British Centurion Mk 2 with a cast turret and gun stabiliser. Meet Her Majesty Hussar!

1.title: Battle Pass vehicles: J26 David
1.description: J26 David is an interned and purchased American P-51B-7 Mustang fighter aircraft in service with the Swedish air forces. Meet the main aviation prize available for every War Thunder player!

2.title: Battle Pass vehicles: S-701
2.description: Iconic German E-boats of the 701-st series had an additional pair of torpedo tubes to shoot sternwards!

0.title: “Repair Factory”
0.description: In the “Mobile Infantry” event you got a good look at exo-suits in intense urban battles. The battles will continue and the battlefield is littered with spent exo-suits - battered, damaged, inoperable. It’s a good time to get behind the scenes and help them get back to action. Prepare some combat-ready exo-suits and get exclusive vehicles in return!

1.title: Mobile Infantry Event
1.description: Soldiers! It’s time to participate in an open field testing of advanced modern infantry equipment in urban combat. Four exoskeleton variations for different combat specializations will be available for you: Assault, Sniper, ATGM Operator, and MANPADS Operator. You will also be able to use a preset of ground vehicles and helicopters.

2.title: Tank Football 2023
2.description: We’re excited to invite you to the War Thunder special tank football event! You will experience the reworked physics of tank to ball interactions, as well as new to the game goalie mechanics, which will allow you to earn mission points and progress up through goalkeeper achievements!

0.title: War Thunder "Sky Guardians" - Changelog
0.description: The first units for the French naval tree, new and updated graphical effects and data structure optimization  along with ejection seats for selected modern jets. Amongst the 43 new as well as updated vehicle models, one can't help but mention the real behemoth - the Char2, the agile AH-6M "Little Bird" helicopter or the first French light cruiser; Duguay-Trouin!. In addition to all this, the winter version of the location "Seversk", a new location for fans of avionics - Pyrenees, and as always, many improvements and fixes! Let's welcome the "Sky Guardians" update!

1.title: Nickname display unification
1.description: The displaying of nicknames for all Gaijin users has been unified.
